Articles.Content: I've been trying to create a name for astronauts for a story that I have in mind, but the game does not help with the names given, and also the only names that I liked, are from astronauts of the long-term laythe mission by brotoro but I do not want to copy those names, so somebody can suggest me some names? I need seven names.

Someone linked an awesome name generator but I can't remember where I saw it now...

It would help to have some context. When I'm making up characters/personalities, usually I try to give a name that suits.

Someone linked an awesome name generator but I can't remember where I saw it now...

It would help to have some context. When I'm making up characters/personalities, usually I try to give a name that suits.

This one? http://fantasynamegenerators.com/

This one? http://fantasynamegenerators.com/

Actually, no, but that doesn't mean it's not a good one

I need seven names.

That's a no brainer:

Sneezy, Grumpy, Bashful, Happy, Dopey, Sleepy, and Thorin Oakenshield.

Edited September 18, 2015 by mikegarrison

That's a no brainer:

Sneezy, Grumpy, Bashful, Happy, Dopey, Sleepy, and Thorin Oakenshield.

I bet it took you a minute to remember them all

How about Father, Mother, Maiden, Crone, Warrior, Smith and Stranger?

I bet it took you a minute to remember them all

Notice the edit? I originally had Grumpy twice.

thanks for the link, it seems useful, but even so, I should think through the personality of the astronauts, it never hurts to think about all the details in advance, I'll see what I do on this.thanks for helping!

- - - Updated - - -

Quick question: Kurt is a name used very often? in two missions I've seen that name ....

I've been trying to create a name for astronauts for a story that I have in mind, but the game does not help with the names given, and also the only names that I liked, are from astronauts of the long-term laythe mission by brotoro but I do not want to copy those names, so somebody can suggest me some names? I need seven names.

Roger Kerman - We have clearance, Clarence.

Clarence Kerman - Roger, Roger. What's our vector, Victor?

Victor Kerman - ?

In homage to the movie Airplane http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080339/quotes (called Flying High here in Australia) I use these 3 as my second crew.

KSP seems to use a random generator based on the name as a seed to assign a specialization, and these three conveniently work out to be one of each - from memory they are...

Victor Kerman - Pilot

Clarence Kerman - Engineer

Roger Kerman - Scientist

Temperance, Charity, Diligence, Patience, Kindness, Humility and Bob.

That's a no brainer:

Sneezy, Grumpy, Bashful, Happy, Dopey, Sleepy, and Thorin Oakenshield.

What's the name of the one that has been replaced by Thorin Oakenshield ?

What's the name of the one that has been replaced by Thorin Oakenshield ?

Tom Cruise

What's the name of the one that has been replaced by Thorin Oakenshield ?

[random filler because four chracters is not enough] Doc.

How about:

1 Konstantin (Tsiolkovsky) - of rocket equation fame

2 Sergei (Korolev) - rocket designer

3 Laika (no surname as far as I know) - first dog in space

4 Yuri (Gagarin) - first man in space

5 Valentina (Tereshkova) - first woman in space, in case anyone had failed to notice ^^

6 Alexey (Leonov)- first spacewalk

7 Valeri (Polyakov) - longest mission
Jack, Robert, Daniel, Thomas, Samantha, Dorothy and Alphonse.

Tom Cruise

Ooh that's harsh, but funny

I recently asked for "volunteer" astronauts on one of the major KSP facebook groups and I had literally dozens of sign ups within the hour!

I renamed the majority of my Career crew to the volunteers and this gave me enough motivation to reactivate my career save and do nice things in it

Pretty much everyone except for the fantastic four stock Kerbals (Jeb Bill Bob Val) are going to be renamed to custom ones. Pity we can't change profession separately from the name.. (Jobs are assigned by the hash of the name).

Jack, Robert, Daniel, Thomas, Samantha, Dorothy and Alphonse.

Victim 1, Victim 2, ...
Alan, Gus, John, Scott, Wally, Gordon, and Deke.
